text: The 2003 World Women's Curling Championship (branded as 2003 Ford World Women's Curling Championship for sponsorship reasons) was held at the Winnipeg Arena in Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada from April 5–13, 2003. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" !bgcolor="#efefef" width="250"| !bgcolor="#efefef" width="250"| !bgcolor="#efefef" width="250"| !bgcolor="#efefef" width="250"| !bgcolor="#efefef"
